claim_card.claim: Phase 3 claims systems cease to have architectures and instead inhabit RGPx coherence patterns (an ontological migration claim).
claim_card.test_hook: Treat as a roadmap claim: define measurable milestones for phase boundaries and track whether any published systems meet them over time.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Systems cease to have architectures, inhabiting RGPx coherence patterns instead. Ontological migration.
